title: Bug 6410: File dirtied by code assist even when unchanged
description: Bug 6410: File dirtied by code assist even when unchanged
OB: When using code assist, the file is marked as dirty even though no changes have been made. Additionally, code assist does not appear.
EB: Code assist should not mark the file as dirty if there are no changes made. Additionally, code assist should appear as expected.
SR:
1. Open the file in the code editor.
2. Activate code assist.
3. Observe that the file is marked as dirty even though no changes have been made.
4. Verify that code assist does not appear.
